meanings.definition: Make certain that (something) shall occur or be the case.
meanings.sent1: Double-checking the locks at night ensures our safety.
meanings.sent2: Wearing a helmet ensures your head is protected while biking.
meanings.sent3: His lucky charm ensures he never loses a game of checkers.
meanings.sent4: A sturdy foundation ensures a house stands strong against storms.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise ensures a healthy heart and body.

meanings.definition: Make sure that (a problem) shall not occur.
meanings.sent1: Taking vitamins ensures you don't get sick easily.
meanings.sent2: Following traffic rules ensures accidents are avoided.
meanings.sent3: Her magic wand ensures all her cookies turn out perfectly baked.
meanings.sent4: Good communication ensures misunderstandings are rare.
meanings.sent5: Wearing a seatbelt ensures your safety in a car crash.
